data.text: @drsarahgrace @Variety I don't really see anything wrong with cloning your dog, but I think its weird.

@drsarahgrace @Variety Huh...I’ve always found cloning interesting and I so would not do this but I’m interested to see the outcomes. After reading some of the comments I think that there’s confusion about cloning within the general public but I haven’t heard much about it in a while. #prescottgenomics
@drsarahgrace @Variety Oh my!! I don't know about this.  I hate losing a pet just as much as the next person, but I'm not sure I could go this far.  #prescottgenomics

@drsarahgrace @Variety I was listening to this on the radio this morning! I heard that she quoted that she was interested in seeing if the new dog produced similar markings and expressed same personality—I’m definitely interested in the outcome, but not something I’d ever do #prescottgenomics
